attributes.title: Million Dollars, But… Season 3 – Official Trailer
attributes.caption: Million Dollars, But... is back with new twisted scenarios, hilarious new guests, and the same deranged humor you know and love.
attributes.description: Million Dollars, But... is back with new twisted scenarios, hilarious new guests, and the same deranged humor you know and love.
attributes.display_title: Million Dollars, But… Season 3 – Official Trailer

attributes.title: Hunted by Linebackers
attributes.caption: Join Gavin, Michael, and Burnie as they discuss the finer points of starting riots, being beaten by children, and dodging professional linebackers.
attributes.description: Join Gavin, Michael, and Burnie as they discuss the finer points of starting riots, being beaten by children, and dodging professional linebackers.

attributes.title: Slow Mo Millionaires
attributes.caption: Join Gavin, Dan, and Blaine as they dodge speeding bullets, wear mascot outfits for a year and have their hands magically replaced by random objects.
attributes.description: Join Gavin, Dan, and Blaine as they dodge speeding bullets, wear mascot outfits for a year and have their hands magically replaced by random objects.

attributes.title: Girls vs Ninjas
attributes.caption: Join Barbara, Lindsay, and Ashley as they fight ninjas and deal with the perils of always being wet.
attributes.description: Join Barbara, Lindsay, and Ashley as they fight ninjas and deal with the perils of always being wet.

attributes.title: Burnie Bloopers & Barbara Burps
attributes.caption: Watch the Rooster Teeth cast flub, fail and f**k up while filming Million Dollars, But...
attributes.description: Watch the Rooster Teeth cast flub, fail and f**k up while filming Million Dollars, But...

attributes.title: Old People Punching
attributes.caption: Join Burnie, Nick, and Kirk as they beat old people and deal with aliens bursting out of their chests.
attributes.description: Join Burnie, Nick, and Kirk as they beat old people and deal with aliens bursting out of their chests. Check out Crunch Time on September 11th!

attributes.title: The Jerk Off Text
attributes.caption: Join Geoff, Greg, and Tim as they gain a million dollars but lose all their dignity.
attributes.description: Join Geoff, Greg, and Tim as they gain a million dollars but lose all their dignity.

attributes.title: Screaming Penis
attributes.caption: Join Barbara, Gavin, and Jeremy for the season 3 finale of Million Dollars, But. Will the crew take a million bucks for a screaming penis or permanent snapchat filters? Find out!
attributes.description: Join Barbara, Gavin, and Jeremy for the season 3 finale of Million Dollars, But. Will the crew take a million bucks for a screaming penis or permanent snapchat filters? Find out!

attributes.title: Super Bloopers!
attributes.caption: Rooster Teeth is a silly place where silly things happen. Watch outtakes and flubs from the set of Million Dollars, But!
